[vc_row el_class=”industry-innerpage-content”][vc_column][vc_column_text]Companies and businesses are tying up with good educational institutions for the continuous development of their employees. Further, the current COVID 19 pandemic situations have taught the lessons to the corporates that they need to focus on the quality of employees, and continuous up-gradation of skillset for the existing employees.

Academic and Content

At JARKSCTC, we help you with proper employee management. Be it training, retention, or getting them ready for the next level. We provide you the services for the following.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”industry-innerpage-content”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

  • 1. Educational Institutions

    With technology being the best in the current times, a lot of educational institutes are introducing their distance learning programs. At JARKSCTC, we help you in connecting with the best colleges or institutes that offer the best learning programs for your employee that can help them in developing themselves and achieve more.

  • 2. Learning Management Systems

    In today’s modern world where technology has put everything in the palm of your hand, you want a learning and development system that teaches and helps your employees on the go. Learning management systems (LMS) are the online platforms through which the corporates train their employees for operations, processes, behavior, or technical. LMS is a crucial part of an employee’s development. At JARKSCTC, you get to connect with some of the leading LMS providers who can help you in getting your training and knowledge base in line with the use of some cutting-edge technology.

  • 3. Corporate Day-care Setup Support

    According to the new maternity benefit rule in India, everyone organization or setup with more than 50 employees need to have a day-care facility either on-premise or in the vicinity of 500 meters. At JARKSCTC, we help you in connection with the best daycare providers in India. They can not only help in setting up the day-care facility but also advise you on how to run the operations as per the rules and regulations suggested by the government.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”industry-innerpage-content”][vc_column][vc_column_text]Gartner defines content services as “a set of services and microservices, embodied either as an integrated product suite or as separate applications that share common APIs and repositories, to exploit diverse content types and to serve multiple constituencies and numerous use cases across an organization.”

At JARKSCTC, our Content agencies offer services to logically and proficiently capture data points, share it on the cloud, or otherwise with the right function, department, person, or process through digital channels.
Depending upon the specific need, our content partners offer a variety of content services ranging from Blogging, Longform content, Case Studies, White papers, E-books, Infographics, templates & Checklist Downloads, Videos, etc.
Depending upon the business-specific requirement, blogging can easily be the foundation of your content marketing strategy, though we must not miss other content strategies to increase traffic, generate leads, and drive sales. A varied content marketing strategy can create magic, helping drive your medium to long-term strategy, sustainable, and noteworthy results out of a campaign. Content marketing is definitely a significant and financial investment driving your business objectives, and hence right partner selection and business objective will be the key to success![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Content, L&D, and Academics Services

[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image=”2928″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
